results.Name: Active Incidents by priority
results.Description: Gives each user a quick view of all Incidents assigned to them, grouped by priority and status. Focuses attention on the most urgent issues and helps effectively manage priorities.

results.Name: Article count per author
results.Description: Shows the number of published articles grouped by their author and stacked by the related service definition

results.Name: Article ranking
results.Description:
For each article, displays the following measurements:
 1. Number of views
2. Number of votes in Self-Service Portal
3. Number of times the article was used as a solution for requests and incidents

results.Name: Article views per article author
results.Description: Shows the sum of all article views grouped by the authors of the articles

results.Name: Article views per service
results.Description: Shows the sum of views for articles in External phase grouped by the Service Definition

results.Name: Articles by phase
results.Description: Shows the number of articles grouped by their current phase to provide an overview of the lifecycle of IT knowledge articles

results.Name: Average elapsed duration for incidents by Service
results.Description: Average elapsed duration of incidents by target type and service

results.Name: Average elapsed duration for incidents by group
results.Description: Average elapsed duration of incidents by target type and owning group

results.Name: Average elapsed duration for incidents by priority
results.Description: Average elapsed duration of incidents by target type and priority

results.Name: Average elapsed duration for requests by group
results.Description: Average elapsed duration of requests by target type and assignment group

results.Name: Average elapsed duration for requests by priority
results.Description: Average elapsed duration of requests by target type and priority

results.Name: Average elapsed duration for requests by service
results.Description: Average elapsed duration of requests by target type and service

results.Name: Catalog demand in the past month
results.Description: Shows the number of Service Requests created during the past month, grouped by their Actual Service. Provides IT with information about Service Catalog demand volume.

results.Name: Changes by category
results.Description: Shows the number of currently active Change Requests grouped by their Category to focus attention on problematic areas.

results.Name: Changes by owning group
results.Description: Shows the current volume of active Changes per Owning Group to identify bottlenecks and effectively manage team load.

results.Name: Changes by priority
results.Description: Shows the number of currently active Change Requests grouped by their Priority. Focuses attention on the most urgent issues and helps effectively manage priorities.

results.Name: Changes by service
results.Description: Shows the current volume of active Change Requests grouped by their Actual Service to focus attention on problematic service areas.

results.Name: Changes unassigned by service
results.Description: Shows the current volume of active Change Requests grouped by their Actual Service to focus attention on problematic service areas.

results.Name: Chat request response achievement rate
results.Description: SLT achievement trend for Chat request response in requests

results.Name: Cloned Report
results.Description: New description

results.Name: Critical tasks due today by group
results.Description: Shows the volume of critical Tasks which are planned to be completed today, listed by Owning Group to identify bottlenecks and effectively manage team load.

results.Name: Critical tasks due today by service
results.Description: Shows the volume of critical Tasks which are planned to be completed today, listed by their Actual Service to focus attention on problematic service areas.

results.Name: Employees by Department and Gender
results.Description: Shows a distribution of employees across departments and gender

results.Name: Employees by Gender
results.Description: Shows a distribution of employees across genders

results.Name: Incidents by assignment group
results.Description: Shows the current volume of active Incidents per Assignment Group to identify bottlenecks and effectively manage team load.

results.Name: Incidents by category
results.Description: Shows the number of currently active Incidents grouped by their Category to focus attention on problematic areas.

results.Name: Incidents by priority and service
results.Description: Shows the number of active Incidents by priority and service in a 100% stacked column format. This format can help to visualize and compare the percentage of open incidents across priority and service.

results.Name: Incidents by service
results.Description: Shows the current volume of active Incidents grouped by their Actual Service to focus attention on problematic service areas.
